tasks.task: Pruning a tree branch to promote vertical growth
subtasks: Observing the angle of the branch (45 degrees)
Determining the location of auxins and hormones
Identifying the target bud to stimulate growth
Understanding the impact of cutting location on bud development
Recognizing the direction the bud will grow based on cut position

tasks.task: Making a cut to direct bud growth
subtasks: Positioning the tool to make a precise cut
Angling the cut to match the natural growth angle of the target bud
Ensuring the cut is made slightly below the tip on the bottom, outward-facing node

Identifying the target bud (on the tip) and understanding its growth direction if cut
